# start

**Type Property**

Each line is displayed so that the end fits in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph.

## Declaration

```swift
static let start: CATextLayerTruncationMode
```

## Constants

- **none**: Each line is displayed so that the text is either wrapped or clipped.
- **end**: Each line is displayed so that the beginning fits in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph.
- **middle**: Each line is displayed so that the beginning and end fit in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph in the middle.

items.description: Each line is displayed so that the text is either wrapped or clipped.
